channel.title: [562]Need help with a command, (::pure)

item.title: [562]Need help with a command, (::pure)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Hey moparscape peoples!
Needin some help, I am looking for a ::pure command. I know how to make the ::master, but I don’t want players to be able to do that…so I obviously can’t copy off of that!

Master in commandPacketHandler

} else if(cmd[0].equals("master")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(i, 200000000); }

I’m thinking something like:

} else if(cmd[0].equals("pure")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(1, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(2, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(3, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(4, 14000000); player.getSkills().addXp(5, 14000000); }
NOTE: Don’t bother commenting on the 1-5 skills xD I just put random ones there …

Would this work?

Read full topic
